snippet: Before Jeremy Jones could attempt to climb and ride a massive peak in Nepal, he simply needed to get back on his snowboard after weeks without riding. This task led to a test run.
lead_paragraph: Before Jeremy Jones could attempt to climb and ride a massive peak in Nepal, he simply needed to get back on his snowboard after weeks without riding. This task led to a test run.

headline.main: Video: Snowboarder Takes a Test Run at 19,000 Feet
